--- select_with_comment.sql
-- foobar
select 1

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      10,
    end:      18,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  17,
        end:  18,
        Expr: &parser.IntLit{
          pos:   17,
          end:   18,
          Value: "1",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From:    parser.FromItemList{},
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT 1
